biotools.summary: AUCpreD is a method that predicts intrinsically disordered regions (IDR). AUCpreD works well without sequence profile, comparing favorably to or even outperforming many methods using sequence profile.

bioschemas.name: AUCpreD
bioschemas.summary: AUCpreD is a method that predicts intrinsically disordered regions (IDR). AUCpreD works well without sequence profile, comparing favorably to or even outperforming many methods using sequence profile.
